name: Black Label Trading Co. - Orthodox - Short Robusto
additionalNotes: Black Label Trading Company creates hand crafted premium cigars of the utmost quality in small batch, highly limited quantities. This allows them to meticulously select the finest tobacco from the richest tobacco-growing regions of Nicaragua, Honduras, Mexico and Ecuador. This allows the master blender, expert growers and hand rollers to produce utterly unique cigars of unsurpassed quality and flavor. Finally, this approach to cigar making replaces the standard cigar experience with the Black Label Cigar Experience. Black Label Trading Company is masterminded by James Brown, cigar maker, Sommelier, contemporary artist, adventure traveler and entrepreneur has spent the last several years living in and exploring the tobacco regions of Central America. Royalty, Benediction, Salvation, Lawless & Last Rites were among the first blends released.  Black Label cigars are unique across the industry, having a certain depth of body and richness to the profile without being too heavy on the palate.
